docs.lead_paragraph: New York would become the first state requiring all addiction treatment programs to help their clients quit smoking under a rule proposed yesterday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The eight candidates vying to be the Democrat nominee for president in the 2008 elections answered questions submitted by CNN and YouTube users in a debate. Participants: Senator Joseph Biden, Jr. (D-De); Senator Hillary Clinton (D-N.Y.); Senator Christopher Dodd (D-Conn.); Former Senator John Edwards (D-S.C.); Former Senator Mike Gravel (D-AK); Representative Dennis Kucinich (D-OH); Senator Barack Obama (D-IL); and Governor Bill Richardson (D-NM). Moderator: Anderson Cooper, CNN host. Location: the Citadel, Charleston, S.C. Monday, July 23, 2007. Here is a full transcript of the event, from CNN:.

headline.seo: Transcript of the CNN/YouTube Democratic Debate

docs.lead_paragraph: A serious  BMX accident left Stephen Murray paralyzed. His condition has caused other athletes to consider the life-altering consequences of what happens when things go wrong in action sports.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Bush’s shortsighted ideological opposition to a highly successful children’s health program would leave millions of children without health insurance at a time when medical costs are soaring.
